Чудеснейшая головоломка, которую я перепроходил более сорока раз.(на старом аккаунте)
После первого прохождения остаётся фантастическое ощущение, 4 часа атмосферы и невероятного юмора…
А потом начинаешь проходить игру, замечая всё новые и новые детали и проходя головоломки по-новому, используя полученные навыки.
Это шедевр. Гениальный шедевр.
Прекрасная головоломка на несколько часов в день >_<
If you don't have this yet, I'm surprised. A short and great game nonetheless
Every second you spend not playing this game you will regret it
Top! Cant wait to get Portal 2 with mor %-off      ^^
Very challenging and interesting puzzle solver, worth getting!
You must aquire and play this.
Very fun game, short but sweet, it teaches you the puzzle concepts without holding your hand, love it. A classic.
If you don't own this game, you hate America!

It started with this.  This small little game that originally came bundled in the Orange Box is what started it all.  The craziness, the lines of GLaDOS, and those turrets, it all ended so soon when players blew past all the puzzles.  But it generated enough interests that a sequel was made.  One cannot play Portal 2 without having first jumped through the first Portal.
If you havnt played it yet, you should.
If you don't own this yet, you're a bad person.
Smart puzzles, engaging narration and a story that will take you on a great ride make this game a must buy!
If you haven't played this game, Well I feel sorry for you. It is a fantastic game of puzzles and humor. It still holds up well even after all these years.
short but very good game play

Amazing game. Great humor and atmosphere. The gameplay creates one of the most refreshing experiences in years.

FPS de Puzzle, um jogo novo e inovador dentro de um estilo já saturado.
Não prima pela violência, mas sim a resolução de situações adversas pelo uso da percepcão lógica. Um verdadeiro estimulante cerebral.
This is a very trippy First Person Puzzle game. The talking A.I. is also hilarious.

I love this game, it is short, but you can play it more than once and it won't get boring.

Amazing, original. Interseting, and a very satiflying gameplay.

Do you want to immerse yourself in a giant lab full of intregue and suspense? Do you want to make physics your bitch? Then get Portal! With puzzling levels and more twists than a belly dancer, this game con keep you entertained for hours, and that's just the theme song! Playable multiple times, you will love this game. I know I do!
mfw you think its a puzzle game but then...
A charming platformer/puzzle with an attitude. Not terribly exciting but enormously satisfying. 4 / 5
Simple gameplay combined with challenging puzzles and a hair-brained, cake obsessed computer voice to lead you through it all. Definitely worth the money.

Quite revolutionary for a FPP game. Definitely worth playing, but you can complete the game in 3 hours on your first playthrough. 

Still, if you haven't played it, go do that!

Like it needs a recommendation? Get it, you'll love it!
Best. Game. Ever. Js.
You'll feel smart after beating all bonus maps!
The start of some awesome new gameplay elements that I hope Valve expands into a whole string of games!
Too short, but an incredibly fun ride all the way to the cake.

It's something of a first-person puzzle game with some cool physics tricks, a commentary track, bonus challenges and extra maps for post-completion of the story, great, very-light combat scenarios, memorable characters, and nice community-created maps available online, all centered around the player's primary tool being a device to get them from point A to point B instantly. It's kinda freaking awesome.
This is the best game ever created. Please play it, and please don't go researching it. You'll just hurt the experience. Go buy it now. I'll give it to you if you need. Get playing it.
Can't enjoy Portal 2 to the fullest without playin' the original.
великолепный набор паззлов
Best puzzle game I have ever played! You will not be dissappointed.
It really messes with your sense of spatial awareness. In a good way.

Jedna z najciekawszych gier ostatnich lat. Niestety krótka (3h).
Kupić w Orange Boxie, Potato Sack lub razem z dwójką. W promocji oczywiście.

Fun, smart and addictive. Pity its so short, the ARG radios are a nice addititon and so are the bonus maps. That helps make up for the shortness. Its story although short is great, the puzzles are great and work well but not in a way you'll end up pulling your hair out. This game takes the cake.
excellent

This game is amazing! Fun and absorbing with challenges that make you think. Portals are a revolutionary idea in gaming! Can't wait until I can play the sequel! :D The only thing about this that was disappointing was that it had to end.

A fun puzzle game that is just long enough to satisfy and yet just short enough to keep you wanting a bit more.  Hilarious dialog with the "villain" in this game, GlaDOS,  really makes this game great!
Fun.But this requires logic!It is tricky but so fun.

Jogo super divertido, desafiador e recompensador.

Acho que este é um dos jogos que coloco na lista dos "Jogos Inteligentes", é aquele jogo que quando você consegue alguma coisa dá vontade de sair contando pra todo mundo e faz com que você se sinta "O CARA".

É assim que eu me sinto quando passo alguma fase deste maravilhoso jogo.

Recomendo a todos, desafio e diversão garantidos.

Nota:10/10

A fresh approach to puzzle games that spawned at least one timeless (and perhaps overused) catchphrase. Portal bought black humor, puzzle solving and a neat graphics style to the masses and it captured a lot of imaginations doing it. If you're looking for something with a slightly slower pace than online shooters then this is a great way to pass the time.
So I came late to it, okay VERY late, but damn if it wasn't awesome.
If you are thinking of getting portal 2, play this first as it sets up the story and is still a really great game.
One of my favourite games of all time. A perfect blend of black humour, gameplay, atmosphere and plot.

I definitely did not play this game for 240 hours. halflife.exe did not close correctly or something back in 2011 when I got this. I remember having like 30 hours on it and then in literally two weeks I had over 200 so i don't know what happened.

Still a great game though. Get it.
Buy this one and the second one.
The game that started it all. Portals themselves are the greatest game mechanic since mouse aiming.
Portal a game you cant do without !!
